duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, prepare, and deliver training programs for Airport Emergency Management employees.
Assess current program and develop strategy to revise the training program for the 24hr Airport Operations Center.
Ensure training documents are developed, distributed and remain current based on operational conditions and processes.
Assess and implement organizational development programs, processes, and training initiatives to support the bureau’ strategies.
Develop methods for evaluation of orientation, performance management and organizational development training.
Participate in budget preparation, submittal and administration related to training programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, International Affairs, Marketing, or related area, 5-8 years of applicable work experience in: international affairs, business development, or marketing with some experience as a supervisor, team leader, etc.

Bachelors degree in Education, Emergency Management, Organizational Development, Business or related field (Equivalent professional experience may be considered for substitution for the required degree on an exception basis) and 8 years' of specific training experience with demonstrated management experience.
Post Certified Instructor preferred, APCO Certified Trainer
